notes.text: sap.m.StepInput: does not work with negative numbers
sap.m.ObjectMarker: text is displayed with small letter
MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu auto-closing in some cases
sap.m.StepInput: make binding higher prio
sap.m.Menu: endContent documentation is now updated
MenuItem: Add aria-expanded attribute
We've now replaced the instanceof check for promises sent to itemValidationHandler with thenable check to handle the pollyfilled promises in UploadSetwithTable
sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Aligned English translation texts
QueryPanel: move item looses focus
sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
Illustration Explorer: Fix deprecated illustrations handling and integration tests
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed rowHeaderPress event firing
sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Update reset announce message for the screen reader
p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove overriden setter for property multipleAppointmentsSelection since the functionality was moved in onBeforeRendering
sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
sap.m.NotofictionListGroup: Press is fired on enter
sap.m.Button: Default button has correct hover color
sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: property multipleAppointmentsSelection is not working when set in XML view
sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning when only oordinates are provided
sap.m.IconTabBar: Font rendering issue in Safari is fixed
sap.m.Avatar: Typo fixed jsdoc
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Reset action announcement added
sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
We've now set the decorative property of avatar to true for action tile
CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
sap.m.Button: has correct color in info toolbar
sap.m.Menu: CSS classes are propagated to the submenus
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
sap.m.Menu: MenuWrapper does not throw JS error when trying to close submenu
sap.m.IconTabHeader: prevent Firefox warning by avoiding getElementById with empty ID
We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
